titles.title: Federal Agency Customer Experience Act of 2017
Federal Agency Customer Experience Act of 2017
Federal Agency Customer Experience Act of 2017
Federal Agency Customer Experience Act of 2017
A bill to require the collection of voluntary feedback on services provided by agencies, and for other purposes.
Federal Agency Customer Experience Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Johnson with amendments. With written report No. 115-156.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 220.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
